The app requires several permissions to work properly:
Foreground service permission is required for the app to run in the background and detect ads
Notification permission is required to display a notification when the service is active
The app needs permission to display over other apps to skip ads in applications like social media. Without this permission, the app won\'t be able to perform the skip action.
The app needs accessibility permission to detect and skip ads automatically. Without this permission, the automatic ad skipping feature won\'t work.
Cannot run the application without required permissions
The app may close in the background. For the best experience, disable battery optimization for this app

Your device does not support secure encrypted storage. The app will continue to work, but some sensitive data may be stored with limited protection. This is a limitation of your device and does not affect the core functionality of the app.

AdSkipper needs access to Accessibility Services to detect ads on your screen and automatically skip them. This allows the app to:

• See screen content to identify ad elements
• Perform scrolling actions to skip past ads
• Work automatically in the background

All data processing happens locally on your device. No screen content or personal information is collected, stored, or transmitted to any external servers.
